Class GraphicsPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.gvsig.raster.tools.app.basic.tool.enhanced.ui.GraphicsPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, PreviewBasePanelTab

    public class GraphicsPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements PreviewBasePanelTab, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    Panel que contiene las gráficas para la modificación del realce. 19/02/2008
    See Also:
